SYNERT SYN SY
{
	#33052f #99225a 0 16
	#862256 #ab184e 17 172
	#ab184e #ff2b53 173 256
Console:
	#000000 #33052f 0 127
	#ab184e #fc768f 128 256
Flat:
	#862256
}

FIREBLU FB
{
    #000040 #000060 0 32
    #900000 #FF0000 33 79
    #000080 #0000FF 80 104
    #900000 #FF0000 105 160
    #000080 #0000FF 161 180
    #900000 #FF0000 181 223
    #900000 #FF0000 224 256

Console:
    #000000 #000010 0   15
    #100000 #200000 16  31
    #000020 #000030 32  47
    #300000 #400000 48  63
    #000040 #000050 64  79
    #500000 #600000 80  95
    #000060 #000070 96  111
    #700000 #800000 112 127
    #000080 #000090 128 143
    #900000 #A00000 144 159
    #0000A0 #0000B0 160 175
    #B00000 #C00000 176 191
    #0000C0 #0000D0 192 207
    #D00000 #E00000 208 223
    #0000E0 #0000F0 224 239
    #E00000 #FF0000 240 255

Flat:
    #0000D0
}

FIREBLU2 FB2
{
    #000040 #000060 0   32
    #FF0000 #900000 33  89
    #000040 #0000FF 90  143
    #FF0000 #900000 144 187
    #000040 #0000FF 188 207
    #FF0000 #900000 208 256

Console:
    #000000 #100000 0   15
    #000010 #000020 16  31
    #200000 #300000 32  47
    #000030 #000040 48  63
    #400000 #500000 64  79
    #000050 #000060 80  95
    #600000 #700000 96  111
    #000070 #000080 112 127
    #800000 #900000 128 143
    #000090 #0000A0 144 159
    #A00000 #B00000 160 175
    #0000B0 #0000C0 176 191
    #C00000 #D00000 192 207
    #0000D0 #0000E0 208 223
    #E00000 #F00000 224 239
    #0000E0 #0000FF 240 255

Flat:
    #0000D0
}

NEWGOLD NG
{
	#3B2D00  #D4AF37 0 192
	#D4AF37  #FFE58F 193 256
Console:
	#000000  #3B2D00 0 127
	#D4AF37  #ffffff 128 256
Flat:
	#D4AF37
}

SILVER SV
{
	#202020  #C3C3C3 0 192
	#D3D3D3  #FFFFFF 193 256
Console:
	#000000  #202020 0 127
	#D3D3D3  #ffffff 128 256
Flat:
	#D3D3D3
}

BRONZE BR
{
	#341A00  #CD7F32 0 192
	#CD7F32  #FFC48B 193 256
Console:
	#000000  #341A00 0 127
	#CD7F32  #ffffff 128 256
Flat:
	#CD7F32
}
